name: Blueberry White Chocolate Macadamia Muffins
author: MarthaWhite(R)
summary: These quick blueberry muffins with white chocolate chips and macadamia nuts are drizzled with more white chocolate for a delicious snack.
ingredients: 2 (7 ounce) packages Martha White® Blueberry Flavored Muffin Mix
¾ cup chopped salted macadamia nuts
directions: Spray 12 medium muffin cups with no-stick cooking spray or line with paper baking cups
Stir together muffin mix and 1 cup milk in large bowl just until moistened
Fold in 1/2 cup baking chips and 1/2 cup macadamia nuts
Sprinkle 1/4 cup macadamia nuts over batter
Bake 13 to 16 minutes or until light golden brown
If not using liners, loosen sides of muffins with knife
Microwave 1/3 cup baking chips and 1 teaspoon milk in uncovered microwave safe bowl on MEDIUM-HIGH power for 45 seconds
If necessary, microwave in 15 second intervals until chocolate is melted
